name: The Wolf and the Lion
writer: David Benioff (created by), D.B. Weiss (created by), George R.R. Martin (based on "A Song of Ice and Fire" by), David Benioff, D.B. Weiss
actors: Sean Bean, Mark Addy, Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, Michelle Fairley
plot: When King Robert learns that Daenerys and the Dothrakis are preparing for war, he decides to attack first. Ned is against the idea saying they should go slowly and learn more but the King calls him a weakling and dismisses him as the King's Hand. Playing in the dungeons, Arya overhears two men plotting against her father. She tells him what she heard and he decides the time has come for him to return to Winterfell. He delays his departure when given the opportunity to speak to the last person his predecessor spoke to, a whore who gave Robert another illegitimate son. The delay is costly however and leads to a serious injury. Catelyn meanwhile takes Tyrion to her sister Lysa, who also happens to be the John Arryn's widow.
